titles.title: Providing for the adoption of the resolution (H. Res. 979) recommending that the House of Representatives find Harriet Miers and Joshua Bolten, Chief of Staff, White House, in contempt of Congress for refusal to comply with subpoenas duly issued by the Committee on the Judiciary and for the adoption of the resolution (H. Res. 980) authorizing the Committee on the Judiciary to initiate or intervene in judicial proceedings to enforce certain subpoenas.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-526, by Ms. Slaughter.
Upon the adoption of H.Res. 982, H.Res. 979 and H.Res. 980 are hereby adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 188.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 982.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 32, 1 Present (Roll no. 60).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/14/2008--Passed House without amendment. Adopts H.Res. 979 (contempt citations against Harriet Miers and Joshua Bolten for refusing to comply with subpoenas related to the firing of certain U.S. Attorneys) and H.Res. 980 (enforcement of such subpoenas).
